name.baseName: Cold processing ; Glass Beads ; Quartz sand, crushed glass, soda ash, calcite, etc. ; Cutting and grinding ; All sizes; NESPS2
冷加工 ; 玻璃珠 ; 石英砂、碎玻璃、纯碱、方解石等 ; 切削打磨 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management35，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management35，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
technology.technologicalApplicability: 本工艺涉及使用玻璃珠石英砂、碎玻璃、纯碱、方解石等材料进行冷加工，适用于各种规模的切削和打磨。主要应用于需要精确材料磨削成型的工业，如玻璃制造、光学和电子行业。所述末端处理管理技术旨在通过处理废水来减少污染。该过程对于产生高化学需氧量 (COD) 的含水污染的工业活动尤其相关，需要有效的沉降分离技术以减少环境影响。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码30,三级代码305.0,四级代码3059文件，在完整版文件中第783页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为玻璃珠，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Waste wateris/，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is /
污染物指标废水量的末端治理技术是/。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为废水量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流

the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution chemical oxygen demandisPrecipitation separation，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management35，The formula for calculating the actual operation rate (k-value) of the end-of-pipe treatment facility is k = 1
污染物指标化学需氧量的末端治理技术是沉淀分离，其效率为35，末端治理设施实际运行率（k值）计算公式为k=治理设施正常运行小时数(小时/年)/企业正常运转小时数（小时/年）。原文件中描述污染物类别为废水，污染物指标为化学需氧量，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流
